餪字的基本解释

餪
nuǎn
古代的一种礼仪，女儿嫁后三日娘家送食物给女儿。

餪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nuǎn］
［《廣韻》乃管切，上緩，泥。］
［《集韻》奴亂切，去换，泥。］
(1)女嫁后三日，母家或亲戚馈送食品或办酒祝贺。
(2)谓设宴于喜庆事前。

餪字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　餪； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1422第25
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?乃管切，音暖。【博雅】餪餫，饋也。【玉篇】餽女也。【集韻】女嫁後三日餉食，爲餪女。　又【集韻】奴亂切，音偄。婚三日而晏謂之餪。【字林】譌从女，非。

餪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
餪字的起名意思

暂无。

send a present of a feast
Basic explanation of words
send a present of a feast
nuǎn
An ancient etiquette, three days after the daughter was married, her family gave food to her daughter.
send a present of a feast
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nuǎn］
["Guangyun" is a pipe cut, slow up, and muddy. ]
["Jiyun" Slave cut, change, mud. ]
(1) Three days after the daughter's marriage, the mother's family or relatives will present food or wine to congratulate.
(2) It is said that the banquet is held before the celebration.
send a present of a feast
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Food Character Department】　餪; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1422 Page 25
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? It's all about cutting, and the sound is warm. 【Bo Ya】Tie, feed. 【Jade articles】Give to women too. [Jiyun] The girl will be a gluttonous girl three days after she gets married.　 [Ji Yun] Slave cut, sound cried. Three days after the marriage, Yan said it was a glutton. 【Word Lin】Zhao Cong female, non.

Name meaning
Nothing.
nuǎn, nuàn
I nuǎn гл.
дарить угощения новобрачной (на 3-й день после свадьбы); одаривать, подносить
餪餫 одаривать яствами
II nuàn сущ.
послесвадебный банкет; угощение после свадьбы
